title: create_labeled_video() is not generating a labeled video in colab
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I'm using Google Colab to create my training set to analyze, plot, and label videos but no labeled videos are loaded into my project folder. The analyze_videos() and plot_trajectories() commands work since I do see meta.pickle and .h5 files in my project 'videos' folder. However, running create_labeled_video() generates no labeled video files. Is there any way to fix this issue? I've tried running `from google.colab import drive` after I ran create_labeled_video() but nothing showed up.

My input:
`deeplabcut.create_labeled_video(path_config_file,videofile_path, videotype=VideoType)`


### Operating System

Windows 10
Google Chrome
Google Colab

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version: 2.2.0.1

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu

### Steps To Reproduce

1. Follow and run blocks of code provided on Colab for DeepLabCut

### Relevant log output
